templates.title: Mission
templates.body-placeholder: Does everyone know what they’re fighting for? What is your mission?

templates.title: Values
templates.description: Core values the organization lives by
templates.body-placeholder: Core values are the fundamental beliefs of the organization. What are they?

templates.title: Diversity
templates.body-placeholder: What is the current state of diversity at your organization? What are your goals?

templates.title: Competition
templates.body-placeholder: What are your competitors up to? Are there any new external threats?

templates.title: CEO Update
templates.body-placeholder: A quick take on what's happened since the last update.

templates.title: Highlights
templates.body-placeholder: What new milestones or accomplishments are you most proud of?

templates.title: Key Metrics
templates.body-placeholder: Discuss recent performance. How are you doing against your targets?
templates.prompt:
Enter the most important metric for the stakeholders of your organization. You'll be able
      to add more later.

templates.title: Key Challenges
templates.body-placeholder: What are you most disappointed about, and what’s the plan to fix it? What threats should everyone be focused on?

templates.title: Lessons Learned
templates.body-placeholder: What’s something you recently learned about your business, customers, or product?

templates.title: Team and Hiring
templates.body-placeholder: Welcome new hires, discuss open positions, and let everyone know about other team changes.

templates.title: Products
templates.body-placeholder: What's shipped recently and how has the roadmap changed? How is the market responding? What’s working? What’s not?

templates.title: Customers
templates.body-placeholder: Is customer satisfaction trending up or down? How are you tracking it? What key issues do your customers have?

templates.title: Marketing
templates.body-placeholder: List any notable marketing activities since the last update. How are your current marketing efforts performing? Anything new planned?

templates.title: Sales
templates.description: Notable sales activity and wins and losses
templates.body-placeholder: Did you close any notable sales? What opportunities are in the pipeline?

templates.title: How You Can Help
templates.description: Ask your stakeholders for help and ideas
templates.body-placeholder: Where do you need the most help from your team and investors?

templates.title: Kudos
templates.description: Celebrate great actions that helped the organization
templates.body-placeholder: Who went above and beyond to help the organization? What did they do?

templates.title: Finances
templates.description: Cash on hand, burn and runway
templates.body-placeholder: Discuss the financial health of the business, and what's changed since the last update.

templates.title: Ownership
templates.body-placeholder: What would you like to share about ownership, such as the # of shares outstanding and size of the employee option pool?

templates.title: Fundraising
templates.body-placeholder: How much would you like to raise? How will you use the funds? Link to the pitch deck, and let everyone know how it’s going. If you’ve already raised, who are the new investors and what are the terms?
